title: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in teaspoon peanut butter, including macros like fat, protein, carbs, and tips for variations in your diet.
h1: Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; no added sugar, salt, or oils; approximately 5 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (natural vs. processed), and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of peanut butter provides ~31 kcal and ~1.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in teaspoon peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 31 kcal for one teaspoon of natural peanut butter.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~2.7 g fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.
Yes, approximately 1.3 g protein per teaspoon.

faqs.q: What about carbs in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Low carbs at ~1 g per teaspoon, with 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in teaspoon peanut butter?
faqs.a: Natural brands are lower (~30 kcal); processed with sugar/oil can reach 35+ kcal.
